trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>-hendelse når en Personsøkerknapp (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Siden") i kontrollen klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryte operasjonen Bla når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Personsøker knappene vanligvis finnes i raden personsøker for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A GridViewPageEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En GridViewPageEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen på siden som er valgt av brukeren og å angi at operasjonen Bla bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the paging operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the GridViewPageEventArgs object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte operasjonen Bla, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for GridViewPageEventArgs-objektet til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewPageEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av GridViewPageEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>|The value of the `newPageIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>| Verdien for den `newPageIndex` parameteren. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the new page to display.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den nye siden skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the new page to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for den nye siden skal vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control performs the paging operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property of the control cannot be used to determine the index of the page selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>inntreffer før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen utfører operasjonen Bla den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>kontrollen kan ikke brukes til å fastsette indeksen for siden som er valgt av brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: Use the NewPageIndex property to determine the index of the page selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Bruk NewPageIndex-egenskapen for å finne ut indeksen på siden som er valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > During the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property still contains the index of the previously displayed page.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Under den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>hendelsen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen inneholder fremdeles indeksen for siden forrige viste.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically override the page index selected by the user by setting it to another value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen overstyrer programmatisk siden indeksen som er valgt av brukeren ved å sette verdien til en annen verdi.

trans-unit.source: The index of the new page to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den nye siden skal vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The NewPageIndex property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: NewPageIndex er mindre enn null.
